text: Theoretical computer science is the study of mathematics and computer science related to the theory of computation and formal methods. Topics in theoretical computer science are: *Automata theory *Category theory *Coding theory *Combinatorial optimization *Computability theory *Computational complexity theory *Computer algebra *Cryptography *Distributed computing *Formal languages *Formal verification *Graph theory *Information theory *Mathematical logic *Parallel computing *Programming language theory *Quantum computation *Type theory ==References==
title: Theoretical computer science
